fields.title: Climate change: Major recent (since 2008) assessment or study on vulnerability, resilience or adaptation of transport at national (or subnational level)
Extreme weather events: Major recent (since 2008) assessment or study on the vulnerability, resilience or adaptation of transport at national (or subnational) level
Relevant national (or subnational) research programme important for the adaptation of transport to climate change or to extreme weather events
Relevant national (or subnational) knowledge and information initiative, platform or similar initiatives important for the adaptation of transport to climate change or to extreme weather events

Systematically collected data that is relevant for assessing the impacts of climate change or extreme weather events on transport, disruption of transport operations, extraordinary infrastructure reconstruction costs, etc.
